files.patch:
@@ -544,0 +544,5 @@ +

Starting with Xcode 26, introduced in macOS 26, the Metal toolchain +no longer comes bundled with Xcode, so it needs to be installed +separately. This can either be done via the Xcode's Settings/Components +UI, or in the command line calling +xcodebuild -downloadComponent metalToolchain.

@@ -355,0 +355,5 @@
+Starting with Xcode 26, introduced in macOS 26, the Metal toolchain no longer
+comes bundled with Xcode, so it needs to be installed separately. This can
+either be done via the Xcode's Settings/Components UI, or in the command line
+calling `xcodebuild -downloadComponent metalToolchain`.
+
